programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.sub-title: Life in Plastic Is Not Fantastic
programme.desc: Bill sues Sophia $23,000 for the cost of three plastic surgery procedures that he paid for during their relationship; Sophia countersues Bill $5,300 for the cost of having her implants removed.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Darrel is suing his cousin Rod over the profits from a food truck business which he claims was his idea.

programme.title: Judge Mom
programme.desc: Maggie was forced to rent a hotel room for a month after her childhood friend, Darla, backpedaled on her offer to allow Maggie to live with her; Darla claims Maggie committed an unforgivable offense back home but has yet to explain.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.desc: In Ohio on June 25, 2008, Anthony Waters was visiting his mother, but was stopped by a group of teenagers who killed him; on February 4, 2002, longtime anti-crime activist, Frances Jones, was murdered in her driveway.

programme.desc: Chosen to lead hunters (Rutger Hauer, Charles S. Dutton) on an expedition, a homeless man (Ice-T) discovers he is to be their prey.
